definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The effects of membrane efficiency become obviously at low water activity of drilling fluid.
sentences.chinese: 鑽井液水活度越小，膜效率的影響越顯著。

sentences.english: In the expressions, activities and activity coefficients are functions of the composition.
sentences.chinese: 在該式中各組元的活度係數可以表示爲組成的函數。

sentences.english: An electronic hygrometer for measuring drilling fluid activity is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製了一種測量鑽井液活度的電子溼度計。

sentences.english: The quantification of absolute activity in vivo is necessary procedure of estimating the absorbed dose of organ or tissue.
sentences.chinese: 器官組織的絕對活度定量是吸收劑量估算的必要步驟。

sentences.english: Plant uptake of a metal depends primarily on the free metal ion activity.
sentences.chinese: 植物對金屬的吸收主要取決於自由態離子活度。

sentences.english: And activity of fly-ash has correlation with the strength of cement fly-ash stabilized hoggin.
sentences.chinese: 且材料的強度與粉煤灰活度指標具有很好的相關性。

definition: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution)/consistency/thickness/density/viscosity
